verses.verse: Now Hiram <WH2438> king <WH4428> of Tyre <WH6865> sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to <WH413> David, <WH1732> and timber <WH6086> of cedars, <WH730> with masons <WH2796> <WH7023> and carpenters, <WH2796> <WH6086> to build <WH1129> him a house. <WH1004>

And David <WH1732> perceived <WH3045> that <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> had confirmed <WH3559> him king <WH4428> over <WH5921> Israel, <WH3478> for <WH3588> his kingdom <WH4438> was lifted up <WH5375> on high, <WH4605> because of <WH5668> his people <WH5971> Israel. <WH3478>
And David <WH1732> took <WH3947> more <WH5750> wives <WH802> at Jerusalem: <WH3389> and David <WH1732> begot <WH3205> more <WH5750> sons <WH1121> and daughters. <WH1323>
Now these <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of his children <WH3205> which <WH834> he had <WH1961> in Jerusalem; <WH3389> Shammua, <WH8051> and Shobab, <WH7727> Nathan, <WH5416> and Solomon, <WH8010>
And Ibhar, <WH2984> and Elishua, <WH474> and Elpalet, <WH467>
And Nogah, <WH5052> and Nepheg, <WH5298> and Japhia, <WH3309>
And Elishama, <WH476> and Beeliada, <WH1182> and Eliphalet. <WH467>

And when the Philistines <WH6430> heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> David <WH1732> was anointed <WH4886> king <WH4428> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> all <WH3605> the Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> to seek <WH1245> <WH853> David. <WH1732> And David <WH1732> heard <WH8085> of it, and went out <WH3318> against <WH6440> them.
And the Philistines <WH6430> came <WH935> and spread <WH6584> themselves in the valley <WH6010> of Rephaim. <WH7497>

And David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> of God, <WH430> saying, <WH559> Shall I go up <WH5927> against <WH5921> the Philistines? <WH6430> and wilt thou deliver <WH5414> them into mine hand? <WH3027> And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him, Go up; <WH5927> for I will deliver <WH5414> them into thine hand. <WH3027>

So they came up <WH5927> to Baal-perazim; <WH1188> and David <WH1732> smote <WH5221> them there. <WH8033> Then David <WH1732> said, <WH559> God <WH430> hath broken in <WH6555> <WH853> upon mine enemies <WH341> by mine hand <WH3027> like the breaking forth <WH6556> of waters: <WH4325> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> they called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of that <WH1931> place <WH4725> Baal-perazim. <WH1188>
And when they had left <WH5800> <WH853> their gods <WH430> there, <WH8033> David <WH1732> gave a commandment, <WH559> and they were burned <WH8313> with fire. <WH784>
And the Philistines <WH6430> yet <WH5750> again <WH3254> spread themselves abroad <WH6584> in the valley. <WH6010>

Therefore David <WH1732> inquired <WH7592> again <WH5750> of God; <WH430> and God <WH430> said <WH559> unto him Go not up <WH3808> <WH5927> after <WH310> them; turn away <WH5437> from <WH4480> <WH5921> them, and come <WH935> upon them over against <WH4480> <WH4136> the mulberry trees. <WH1057>

And it shall be, <WH1961> when thou shalt hear <WH8085> <WH853> a sound <WH6963> of going <WH6807> in the tops <WH7218> of the mulberry trees, <WH1057> that then <WH227> thou shalt go out <WH3318> to battle: <WH4421> for <WH3588> God <WH430> is gone forth <WH3318> before <WH6440> thee to smite <WH5221> <WH853> the host <WH4264> of the Philistines. <WH6430>

David <WH1732> therefore did <WH6213> as <WH834> God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> him: and they smote <WH5221> <WH853> the host <WH4264> of the Philistines <WH6430> from Gibeon <WH4480> <WH1391> even to <WH5704> Gazer. <WH1507>

And the fame <WH8034> of David <WH1732> went out <WH3318> into all <WH3605> lands; <WH776> and the LORD <WH3068> brought <WH5414> <WH853> the fear <WH6343> of him upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> nations. <WH1471>
